name: Eduardo Jaques Spinosa
content: Eduardo J. Spinosa Eduardo J. Spinosa Professor at the Department of Informatics of the Federal University of Paraná, Brazil. PhD in Computer Science from the University of São Paulo. Research interests Machine learning, bio-inspired computing, artificial neural networks, deep learning, swarm intelligence, evolutionary computation, natural language processing, recommender systems, robotics, bioinformatics, novelty detection, data streams. Publications Currículo Lattes Email spinosa@inf.ufpr.br
